column1: prompt
What is the best way to care for a bonsai tree?
What is the primary benefit of a membership loyalty program?
Provide three benefits of exercising.

Version B: The Starry Night by Claude Monet
Generate a list of five questions to ask someone about their job.
Based on the following article, how do you think education can promote global understanding? https://examplearticle.com
Generate an interesting and factual anecdote about a famous musician
Write a description of a fun adventure experience.
Name three fruits and three vegetables
Give three types of kitchen utensils
Suggest a location for a romantic date night
Generate an appropriate input and output to create confusing sentences The cat is black
Estimate the probability of a coin landing on heads
Describe what it would feel like to float in the night sky
Design an algorithm to find the longest word in a string.
Develop a timeline for the American Revolution.

Re-word the following joke without changing the punch-line. Why did the chicken cross the playground?
To get to the other slide.
Write a list of advantages of digital media in one sentence.
Re-word the following proverb without changing its meaning. A stitch in time, saves nine
Generate a list of 5 technologies used in AI.
Change the following sentence to third person narrative point of view. I am running late for work.
Re-write the sentence to include an adverbial phrase The cat laid down on the floor.
Describe the symbolism of the rose in the poem. "A rose's sweet smell has a beauty untold / It blooms with grace beneath the sky of blue."
Generate a sentence that describes an action that can be done with a laptop.
Convert the following to a fact in the present tense. The company reorganised restructuring their teams
Transform the following sentence so that its meaning is still retained but the pronoun is changed from singular to plural. He had not done his homework.
Reformulate the following sentence with a passion. I enjoy walking on the beach.
Generate a sentence using the following words: cake, snow, April
Generate a sentence using the following words: tiger, river, dance

Increase the font size to 12 points.
Write a description of the movie Inception.
Name three popular authors from the 20th century.
Arrange these words in alphabetical order: green, ink, orange.

Read this text, then write a summary of its main points Robotic process automation (RPA) is a form of technology that uses software bots to automate repetitive and mundane tasks. RPA is advantageous because it helps to reduce errors, increases accuracy and boosts efficiency.
List 3 reasons why people use chatbots

List 5 health benefits of exercise.
Generate a list of 5 arguments for government regulation of business.
Develop a marketing slogan for a home automation product.

Explain the concept of a p-value in predictive modeling.
Spell out the full abbreviation "NATO".

Generate two examples of similes.

Analyze the text and provide an estimation about the emotion behind it. I am so frustrated. Nothing ever seems to go right for me.
Complete the following text with a suitable word. I was walking down the street when suddenly I heard a loud ____.

Generate a query to extract the required information from the table. Given the table 'Employee':

Retrieve the names of the Employees who have more than 10 years of experience.

Create a chart to visualize the given data. Number of cars manufactured in the US in 2019: 11 million
Number of cars manufactured in the US in 2020: 8 million
De-identify the following text by replacing any words which could reveal a person's identity with a placeholder. My sister Kathryn attended the University of Washington in Seattle.
Given the following text, rewrite it to be more concise. The new software version has the capability of being able to support newer operating systems and hardware components.

Reformat the following document into an easily-digestible infographic. The US has been sending astronauts to space since 1961, with the first human in space being Yuri Gagarin, a Soviet citizen. Since then, NASA has sent over 450 people to space on more than 145 missions. The longest spaceflight in history was the Mission of Scott Kelly and Mikhail Kornienko from March 27, 2015 to March 1, 2016 – 342 days.
Divide the following list into two columns, categorizing the items according to type. Bananas, Apples, Bread, Potatoes
Complete the following analogy: “A relationship is like a ______ because ______.”

Produce a list of 10 idioms relating to the given topic. Grief
